video.title: Crossing Jordan
video.synopsis: When medical examiner Jordan Cavanaugh returns to Boston to resume her career in the coroner's office, she uses unorthodox methods to solve crimes.

episodes.synopsis: Jordan suspects that what appears to be a routine suicide of a teen prostitute may instead be a cover-up for foul play.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A waitress's unusual reaction to the shooting death of her cab driver husband piques Jordan's curiosity about the real story behind the killing.
episodes.title: The Dawn of a New Day

episodes.synopsis: Jordan visits a prison, where she attempts to piece together a scenario to confirm her hunch about a victim.
episodes.title: The Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: Jordan finds herself knee-deep in strippers and Russian gangsters when she responds to a suspected murder-suicide at a gentleman's club.
episodes.title: Born to Run

episodes.synopsis: Loyalty fuels Jordan's desire to figure out how a firefighter hero, who was also her childhood best friend, died battling a suspicious blaze.
episodes.title: You Can't Go Home Again

episodes.synopsis: Jordan investigates the murder of a senator's daughter who was found stabbed to death in a park.
episodes.title: Believers

episodes.synopsis: The autopsy of a schoolboy killed in a traffic accident leads Jordan to discover that the youngster really died during a kidnapping.
episodes.title: Sight Unseen

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of a floating corpse forces Jordan into a nationwide manhunt for a serial killer as she teams with a famed FBI criminal profiler.
episodes.title: Digger: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jordan finds herself buried deep in the manhunt for the serial killer known as Digger.
episodes.title: Digger: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a veteran cop is murdered in the line of duty, Jordan leads the police -- and a vengeful detective -- to a possible suspect.
episodes.title: Blue Christmas

episodes.synopsis: After a security guard foils a bank robbery, leaving one of the thieves dead, Jordan and Garret sort through the gun battle's remnants.
episodes.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time

episodes.synopsis: The gruesome discovery of a slain mother and her two young sons pulls Jordan into a triple-homicide investigation.
episodes.title: Blood Relatives

episodes.synopsis: Jordan's views about faith are tested as she attempts to scientifically explain how a homeless man could have died in a church.
episodes.title: Miracles & Wonders

episodes.synopsis: Jordan works the case when a former student takes a flying leap out of a college dorm window during an apparent drug binge.
episodes.title: Four Fathers

episodes.synopsis: Jordan catches a suicide case involving a terminally ill senior citizen, reuniting her with country bumpkin detective Woody Hoyt.
episodes.title: Acts of Mercy

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Det. Winslow find themselves in a race against time as they search for a missing infant.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: The death of a suburban housewife with a penchant for punishment leads Jordan to an Internet company designed to fulfill even the darkest fantasies.
episodes.title: Crime & Punishment

episodes.synopsis: When a young corporal abandons her post in Afghanistan and ends up dead in a Boston alley, Jordan reluctantly teams with a Marine detective.
episodes.title: With Honor

episodes.synopsis: A chance encounter with a mysterious suitor at Max's bar forces Jordan to examine her uneventful love life and risk a fling.
episodes.title: For Harry, with Love and Squalor

episodes.synopsis: When a leading cardiologist dies performing surgery, Jordan recalls how the arrogant surgeon's negligence almost destroyed her career.
episodes.title: The Gift of Life

episodes.synopsis: Jordan seeks Dr. Leo Gelber's assistance with one of her most puzzling cases.
episodes.title: Someone to Count On

episodes.synopsis: Jordan discovers that the apparent hanging suicide of a mental patient was staged and rules the death a homicide.
episodes.title: Secrets & Lies: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sparked by a mysterious gift, Jordan agrees to dig into a 10-year-old triple homicide in exchange for help from a catatonic mental patient.
episodes.title: Secrets & Lies: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Three thousand miles from Boston, Jordan continues her search for the man who may know the truth about her mother's murder.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: Jordan teams with the new medical examiner and finds herself in the middle of a power struggle within the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms.
episodes.title: Bombs Away

episodes.synopsis: A trip to the Total-Mart turns tragic as Jordan and Nigel pronounce the friendly store greeter dead from a massive heart attack.
episodes.title: The Truth Is Out There

episodes.synopsis: Jordan finds herself in an unfamiliar position as she defends longtime confidant Det. Woody Hoyt when he's accused of using excessive force.
episodes.title: Payback

episodes.synopsis: After Jordan's first venture into the dating scene ends abruptly, she finds herself investigating her would-be suitor's alleged suicide.
episodes.title: As if by Fate

episodes.synopsis: Jordan is called to the scene of an explosion and must help a trapped survivor stay conscious while the team attempts to free him from the rubble.
episodes.title: One Twelve

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Woody investigate when a lesbian talk-show host's lover is stabbed to death.
episodes.title: Scared Straight

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of a Hollywood starlet's body in the back of a smashed truck on a country road leads Jordan back to the streets of Southern California.
episodes.title: Don't Look Back

episodes.synopsis: Lily's principles are tested when a murder victim's wife makes a late-night confession, putting the grief counselor in a tight spot.
episodes.title: Prisoner Exchange

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into a Boston woman's murder hits close to home for Garret because the prime suspect is a well-known forensics expert.
episodes.title: Ockham's Razor

episodes.synopsis: Jordan investigates the death of a Boston woman found shot in an apparent carjacking gone wrong.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of a blizzard, Jordan and Elaine are quarantined when the morgue's newest recruit, Dr. Winslow, collapses in a seizure.
episodes.title: Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: Jordan joins with Woody and the rest of the morgue staff to look into an unsolved homicide from Max's days as a rookie detective.
episodes.title: Strangled

episodes.synopsis: Jordan investigates the stabbing death of a young witness the police needed to convict a notorious murderer.
episodes.title: Wild Card

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into the brutal killing of an unidentified vagrant hits home for Bug, who sets out to learn the man's identity.
episodes.title: John Doe

episodes.synopsis: Drawn in by a mysterious death, Jordan investigates the alleged murder of a chemist who may have been the victim of a government conspiracy.
episodes.title: Conspiracy

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a woman's alleged suicide, Jordan reunites with a love from her past -- the victim's husband.
episodes.title: Cruel and Unusual

episodes.synopsis: When a teenage girl caught in a meth lab explosion dies, Jordan seeks justice for the victim while at the same time comforting the girl's mother.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: When a kidnapped woman's body washes ashore 13 years later, Jordan believes the husband is the killer. But the evidence doesn't support her theory.
episodes.title: Dead Wives' Club

episodes.synopsis: When his hometown sheriff is dropped out of a plane over Wisconsin, Woody investigates his former mentor's murder.
episodes.title: Sunset Division

episodes.synopsis: Pushing for a promotion, Woody is helped by Garret, Peter, Nigel and Bug in an effort to solve a triple homicide.
episodes.title: Pandora's Trunk: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jordan's quest for her mother's killer leads to the trunk of an abandoned Ford and the 23-year-old skeleton of a murdered Boston detective.
episodes.title: Pandora's Trunk: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Macy's skills are tested when an obsessed high school student is suspected in what appears to be a satanic murder.
episodes.title: Devil May Care

episodes.synopsis: While serving as a juror, Jordan discovers that the medical evidence against the defendant is questionable.
episodes.title: Slam Dunk

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the murder of a badly beaten woman, Jordan reunites with a former high school boyfriend who's become a Catholic priest.
episodes.title: Til Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: On her first day as a pathology resident, Devan Maguire must tell a murder victim's wife that her husband's body contained traces of radioactivity.
episodes.title: Is That Plutonium in Your Pocket, or Are You Just Happy to See Me?

episodes.synopsis: Macy travels to Mexico to prove that the man responsible for a heinous crime is the same wealthy heir Macy investigated years earlier.
episodes.title: Dead or Alive

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Devan attempt to notify a woman that the remains of her baby -- who'd been missing for almost 20 years -- have been found.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: When the prime suspect in a well-publicized kidnapping is found stabbed to death, Jordan studies the body in an effort to find the missing girl.
episodes.title: Missing Pieces

episodes.synopsis: When a seemingly healthy student dies after a single punch from a police officer, Jordan is reluctant to rule the blow the sole cause of death.
episodes.title: Most Likely

episodes.synopsis: Bug suspects that a reporter found beaten and shot to death may have been murdered for trying to protect his source.
episodes.title: All the News Fit to Print

episodes.synopsis: When an author of science-fiction novels is found dead with bite marks on his neck, Nigel tries to convince Woody that a vampire is to blame.
episodes.title: Revealed

episodes.synopsis: When a distraught woman reports that she accidentally shot and killed a man who assaulted her, the police discover an illuminating connection.
episodes.title: He Said, She Said

episodes.synopsis: Woody enlists Jordan's help in identifying a body that washed ashore after a storm.
episodes.title: Dead in the Water

episodes.synopsis: Hindered by her father's disappearance, Jordan relies on a suspended Woody to help track down her missing brother, James.
episodes.title: Oh, Brother Where Art Thou?

episodes.synopsis: When a blackout hits the city, Jordan and Bug find themselves trapped in the middle of a multicar pileup in the Ted Williams Tunnel.
episodes.title: After Dark

episodes.synopsis: When a millionaire turns up dead after a charity event, suspect No. 1 is his agoraphobic neighbor, a renowned and attractive artist with a motive.
episodes.title: Out of Sight

episodes.synopsis: When Jordan begins to act strangely after a night of dancing with Woody, her behavior causes concern among her co-workers.
episodes.title: Intruded

episodes.synopsis: When skeletal remains are found in a spooky house from Jordan's past, her pursuit of uncovering the truth leads to a shocking secret.
episodes.title: Deja Past

episodes.synopsis: Nigel finds himself with Jordan in the Deep South after a haunted man asks for Jordan's professional opinion about his father's 40-year-old murder.
episodes.title: Justice Delayed

episodes.synopsis: When the serial killer known as "Leviathan" resurfaces after four years, Woody teams with an ambitious cop to interrogate the prime suspect.
episodes.title: Blue Moon

episodes.synopsis: Montecito Casino higher-ups Sam and Danny are suspects in a high roller's death in this two-part storyline that continues in Season 2 of "Las Vegas."
episodes.title: What Happens in Vegas Dies in Boston

episodes.synopsis: An exhausted Jordan snaps when Devan calls asking her to cover the graveyard shift at the morgue.
episodes.title: Fire from the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Jordan think they have an open-and-shut case when a college fencing star is found dead in his dorm room from an apparent suicide.
episodes.title: Necessary Risks

episodes.synopsis: A mass homicide at a diner has Woody searching for a motive until the alleged shooter's identity is revealed by the FBI.
episodes.title: A Stranger Among Us

episodes.synopsis: When a crazed gunman opens fire in the morgue and kills a bystander, Jordan wonders whether there's a link to any of the bodies recently brought in.
episodes.title: Murder in the Rue Morgue

episodes.synopsis: The body of an heiress from an elite family is discovered in the woods after an apparent fall from a horse. But the trace evidence points to murder.
episodes.title: Family Affair

episodes.synopsis: A one-armed Boston man's suicide leads Jordan to a missing murder weapon from an eight-year-old Los Angeles homicide.
episodes.title: You Really Got Me

episodes.synopsis: Macy looks into the deaths of a passenger and a baggage handler at the airport, which have authorities concerned about a lethal airborne virus.
episodes.title: Gray Murders

episodes.synopsis: A recently released mobster seeks revenge on Jordan's father and three other Boston cops who put the gangster behind bars.
episodes.title: It Happened One Night

episodes.synopsis: When Woody finds an unmarked mass grave, the team discovers that the remains to belong to missing Boston mobsters.
episodes.title: Skin and Bone

episodes.synopsis: Jordan, Garret and Woody attempt to track down evidence related to a string of brutal murders that occurred more than two decades earlier.
episodes.title: Locard's Exchange

episodes.synopsis: Jordan suspects foul play in the death of a bodyguard assigned to protect the son of a high-ranking Dominican consulate officer.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: When a jazz legend's charming daughter is suspected of orchestrating several black widow-style killings, Garret is quickly entangled in her web.
episodes.title: Embraceable You

episodes.synopsis: When his new soul mate's daughter is kidnapped in the middle of the night, Nigel is left questioning more than forensic evidence.
episodes.title: Forget Me Not

episodes.synopsis: When a witness comes forward with information about a 20-year-old case involving a prominent politician, Macy is suspended for an alleged cover-up.
episodes.title: Jump, Push, Fall

episodes.synopsis: The staff tries to conform to the stringent new guidelines put in place by interim Chief Medical Examiner Jack Slocum.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home II

episodes.synopsis: A multicity mystery begins when a Las Vegas showgirl shows up at the Boston morgue, sets a corpse ablaze and then hurls herself out the window.
episodes.title: Luck Be a Lady

episodes.synopsis: When the body of one of three missing boys is found, an ailing Jordan heads to the site but gets trapped in an abandoned mine with the other two boys.
episodes.title: Under the Weather

episodes.synopsis: A deceased inmate leads Jordan to investigate the appalling conditions of the prison's health-care system.
episodes.title: Judgement Day

episodes.synopsis: When a reporter asks for a favor, Jordan finds herself sucked into a religious cult leader's warped world.
episodes.title: Enlightenment

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Macy reopen a 10-year-old missing persons case when a body is found in a national park.
episodes.title: Total Recall

episodes.synopsis: It's a race against time as the entire morgue staff works to stop a series of copycat murders.
episodes.title: Road Kill

episodes.synopsis: Woody is out to nab a cop killer whose crime leaves two teenagers fatherless, but he's soon suspected of planting evidence.
episodes.title: A Man in Blue

episodes.synopsis: Jordan discovers new clues related to an old case when she's brought in to analyze an accident scene with a missing body.
episodes.title: Death Goes On

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Woody are called to investigate a mysterious murder at a quaint bed-and-breakfast that's famous for a 100-year-old crime.
episodes.title: Loves Me Not

episodes.synopsis: Macy is the key witness in a murder case. But his credibility is questioned when he's charged with driving under the influence just before the trial.
episodes.title: The Elephant in the Room

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Woody find themselves investigating the murder of a military officer who had just come home from a tour of duty in Iraq.
episodes.title: Code of Ethics

episodes.synopsis: Macy is stunned when he discovers that a body from a gang-related shooting is that of his daughter's boyfriend.
episodes.title: Dreamland

episodes.synopsis: The team is called in when a terrorist bomber strikes a Boston commuter train, leaving several people dead and many more injured.
episodes.title: Death Toll

episodes.synopsis: When six Massachusetts firefighters perish in a blaze, Macy, Jordan and Nigel begin investigating to determine whether foul play was involved.
episodes.title: Blame Game

episodes.synopsis: After hearing gunshots in her apartment building, Jordan investigates and finds a 13-year-old girl standing over her father with a gun in her hand.
episodes.title: Someone to Watch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: A schizophrenic living in a halfway house becomes the prime suspect when a teenage girl is murdered in the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Save Me

episodes.synopsis: When a professional baseball player is accused of rape, a shocking twist emerges when the team checks out his alibi.
episodes.title: Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: Jordan investigates the mysterious murder of a woman believed to be a miracle worker and a living saint.
episodes.title: Mysterious Ways

episodes.synopsis: While trying to deliver a deceased elderly man's personal effects to his family, Macy finds a young boy being held captive.
episodes.title: Mace vs. Scalpel

episodes.synopsis: After celebrating Lily's engagement, a shell-shocked Jordan wakes up next to the dead body of her former beau, J.D. Pollack.
episodes.title: Don't Leave Me This Way

episodes.synopsis: A fugitive on the run, Jordan travels to Washington, D.C., to figure out what happened the night Pollack was murdered.
episodes.title: Retribution

episodes.synopsis: Special prosecutor William Ivers is brought in to investigate the practices of the coroner's office -- and specifically those of Jordan.
episodes.title: Shattered

episodes.synopsis: When a riot erupts in Boston after police shoot an 8-year-old boy 33 times, Jordan and the team investigate the incident.
episodes.title: 33 Bullets

episodes.synopsis: When a Las Vegas boxer is found dead after winning a match, Danny McCoy and Delinda Deline opt to stay in Boston to help Jordan and Woody investigate.
episodes.title: Crazy Little Thing Called Love

episodes.synopsis: Special prosecutor Ivers continues his investigation into the morgue's practices, and Macy again asks Jordan to behave herself.
episodes.title: Mr. Little and Mr. Big

episodes.synopsis: A defense attorney who has a history with Macy is found shot, presumed dead and taken to the morgue for an autopsy. But he's very much alive.
episodes.title: Night of the Living Dead

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer taunts Nigel through his blog with clues that lead to a real-life murder scene.
episodes.title: Hubris

episodes.synopsis: Jordan defies the orders of special prosecutor Ivers by performing an autopsy that turns up a deadly virus and could put the whole city at risk.
episodes.title: Isolation

episodes.synopsis: When Jordan, Macy and Det. Matt Seely attempt to solve a 16-year-old girl's murder, they discover that she was keeping a scandalous secret.
episodes.title: Seven Feet Under

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Woody have the difficult task of trying to solve the murder of a pregnant woman whose baby is missing from her womb.
episodes.title: Fall from Grace

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Jordan desperately try to find a hijacked school bus full of children.
episodes.title: Faith

episodes.synopsis: Macy takes Jordan to the hospital for her extremely risky brain surgery.
episodes.title: Sleeping Beauty

episodes.synopsis: Macy and the rest of the coroners take turns caring for Jordan after her brain surgery.
episodes.title: Post Hoc, Ergo Propter Hoc

episodes.synopsis: Jordan decides she's ready to get back to work, but a reluctant Macy thinks it's too soon.
episodes.title: In Sickness & in Health

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Ivers are forced to work together on a peculiar case.
episodes.title: Dead Again

episodes.synopsis: An odd man wanders into Woody's office and claims that someone has given him a slow-acting poison that will eventually kill him.
episodes.title: D.O.A.

episodes.synopsis: Kate is put in charge of forming a team to find out what killed a ship full of people sailing on the Norwegian Sea.
episodes.title: Crash
